activities: Pitney  Bowes Inc. and its controlled U.S. subsidiaries and affiliates (including Pitney Bowes Software) receive personal information from the EU/EEA and Switzerland to enable us to provide goods and services to customers. recoursemech: Pitney Bowes has established internal policies and procedures for responding to and resolving complaints and disputes on a 24/7 basis and will take all steps necessary to remedy any problems that may arise out of failure to comply with the Safe Harbor principles.
